Load Data
```{r}
library(readr)
Ski_to_Sea_Data <- read_csv("Ski_to_Sea_Data.csv")
View(Ski_to_Sea_Data)
```

Correlation Matrix
```{r}
# Select specific variables
selected_data <- Ski_to_Sea_Data[, c("overall_minutes", "canoe_minutes", "xcski_minutes", "downhill_minutes", "kayak_minutes", "roadbike_minutes", "run_minutes", "xcbike_minutes")]

# Compute correlation matrix
cor(selected_data)
```

```{r}
first <- Ski_to_Sea_Data %>% filter(Year == 2009) %>% select(overall_minutes)
last <- Ski_to_Sea_Data %>% filter(Year == 2019) %>% select(overall_minutes)
```
